title: PRD ReDesign: Shipping Page
background: The Shipping Page is a key informational page designed to provide users with clear, transparent details about DoktorABC's delivery methods, timelines, packaging, and policies.

target_audience.pre_order_users: Researching delivery options before making a purchase
target_audience.post_order_users: Looking for details about their shipment, expected delivery times, or carrier information

page_purpose: To give users a complete, transparent, and trustworthy overview of DoktorABC's shipping methods including: Delivery types and timelines, Availability and restrictions, Privacy and packaging standards, Contact guidance for support
success_indicators: Increase conversion rate from users who view the shipping page â†’ paid order
Reduce % of customer service tickets related to pre-order shipping questions

shipping_options.description: If you need it especially quickly, In select cities, we offer 2-hour delivery directly via courier. As soon as your prescription is approved, the courier will be on its way - directly to your address.
highlights: Immediate shipping after the doctor's approval
shipping_options.note: Participation varies by region - check availability at checkout.

shipping_options.title: DHL Express 24-48 h
shipping_options.description: Our standard shipping method: Once your prescription has been created, we forward the package to our service provider DHL. Delivery in Germany is usually within 1-2 business days.
highlights: Delivered to your desired address or Packstation

shipping_options.option: Pickup - Pick up at the pharmacy
shipping_options.title: Pick up on site
shipping_options.description: If you prefer to visit in person, select 'Pickup' when ordering and pick up your medication from one of our partner pharmacies.
highlights: No waiting for delivery - ready for immediate pickup

design_sections.notes: Same structure as homepage and category pages

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Fast. Discreet. Reliable: Your shipping with DoktorABC', Subtitle with USPs, Relevant hero image (delivery or neutral packaging theme)
hero_usps: >90% of all orders are shipped within 24 hours
Express delivery in 2 hours is available in selected locations
Neutral packaging with no externally visible indication of contents
Free delivery with all options (where applicable)
design_sections.notes: Must be visually clear, premium, and trustworthy

design_sections.requirements: Main title, subtitle, Three Option Cards: 2-hour express, DHL 24-48h, Pickup
design_sections.notes: Each shipping option must be presented as an individual card with clear icons and visual differentiation

design_sections.requirements: Heading: 'Our neutral packaging: Why, how, what?', Explanation paragraph, Bullet points explaining neutral packaging
design_sections.notes: Design should visually emphasize discretion. Use muted colors, clean layout, and iconography of packaging and privacy.

design_sections.section: How It Works - Step by Step Section
design_sections.requirements: Heading: 'How your shipping works with DoktorABC', Numbered steps (5 steps total)
design_sections.notes: Present steps in a horizontal timeline or numbered column layout with icons for each step.

design_sections.requirements: Heading: 'Frequently asked questions about shipping', 6 questions with answers
design_sections.notes: FAQs should appear in collapsible accordion format with icons for each question

design_sections.requirements: Heading: 'Ready for your treatment?', Paragraph, Button: 'Start consultation now', Category navigation buttons below
design_sections.notes: CTA must be strong and visible, styled like homepage buttons.
Must appear at bottom of page before footer. Simple, readable text format.
